title: The Counter's Mastery
subtitle: For Loops and Iteration
hints: To count from 1 to 10, use: for (int level = 1; level <= 10; level++)
For a countdown from 5 to 1, use: for (int count = 5; count >= 1; count--)
Calculate damage as: int damage = level * 5
Calculate XP as: int xp = level * 100, then use totalXp += xp
Remember: initialization; condition; increment all go in the for ( ) parentheses
learningObjectives: Use for loops to iterate a specific number of times
Understand for loop syntax: initialization; condition; increment
Count forwards and backwards with for loops
Accumulate values in a total variable
